mapper.sql: ID, VIDEO, SEQUENCE, CONFIGID, ISVIDEOORPHOTO, UPDATETIME, USERID
mapper.select: select * from PHOTOSANDVIDEOS where deptid =#{deptid} order by sequence asc
mapper.update: update PHOTOSANDVIDEOS p set p.sequence = (p.sequence-1) where p.sequence> (select v.sequence from PHOTOSANDVIDEOS v where v.id=#{id} ) and deptid =(select v1.deptid from PHOTOSANDVIDEOS v1 where v1.id=#{id})
update PHOTOSANDVIDEOS p set p.sequence = (p.sequence-1) where p.id=#{id}
update PHOTOSANDVIDEOS p set p.sequence = (p.sequence+1) where p.id=#{id}

update PHOTOSANDVIDEOS p set p.sequence = (p.sequence+1) where p.sequence= ((select v.sequence from PHOTOSANDVIDEOS v where v.id=#{id} )-1) and deptid =(select v1.deptid from PHOTOSANDVIDEOS v1 where v1.id=#{id})

update PHOTOSANDVIDEOS p set p.sequence = (p.sequence-1) where p.sequence= ((select v.sequence from PHOTOSANDVIDEOS v where v.id=#{id} )+1) and deptid =(select v1.deptid from PHOTOSANDVIDEOS v1 where v1.id=#{id})
mapper.insert: insert into PHOTOSANDVIDEOS (ID, VIDEO, SEQUENCE, ISVIDEOORPHOTO, USERID, PHOTO,DEPTID,title,LOCALURL) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isvideoorphoto,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{photo,jdbcType=BLOB},#{deptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{localURL,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
